incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We have identified this issue. This is only impacting some organizations that have "Install CA to system certificate store" enabled.
Cloudflare is investigating an issue that is affecting WARP device registrations. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

incidents.name: Issues creating Configuration Rules in Dashboard

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved. The impact window was between 10:10AM UTC and 3:11 PM UTC.

Some customers may have been unable to create Configuration Rules in the Cloudflare dashboard. These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge. A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
